scripts.pg-up: docker run --name typeorm-postgres-demo-db -d -p 5432:5432 -e POSTGRES_DB=demodb -e POSTGRES_USER=demouser -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=demopassword postgres -c log_statement=all
scripts.pg-down: docker stop typeorm-postgres-demo-db && docker rm typeorm-postgres-demo-db
scripts.pg-cli: docker exec -it typeorm-postgres-demo-db psql -U demouser demodb
